doc:
Douglas Croft https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Douglas_Croft 0 Douglas Croft (August 12, 1926 – October 24, 1963), born Douglas Malcom Wheatcroft, was an American child actor who is best remembered for being the first person to portray the DC Comics character Robin, the Boy Wonder, as well as his secret identity Dick Grayson, in the 1943 serial Batman when he was 16 years old. Douglas_Croft ( August_12_,_1926 – October_24_,_1963 ) , born Douglas_Malcom_Wheatcroft , was an_American_child_actor who is_best_remembered for being the_first_person to_portray the_DC_Comics_character_Robin , the_Boy_Wonder , as_well_as his_secret_identity_Dick_Grayson , in the_1943_serial_Batman when he was 16_years old .
